00024 #include "CVTranslator.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 using namespace pwiz::msdata;
00032 
00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 void test(const CVTranslator& translator, const string& text, CVID correct)
00038 {
00039     CVID result = translator.translate(text);
00040     if (os_) *os_ << text << " -> (" << cvinfo(result).id << ", \"" 
00041                   << cvinfo(result).name << "\")\n"; 
00042     unit_assert(result == correct);
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 void test()
00047 {
00048     if (os_) *os_ << "test()\n"; 
00049 
00050     CVTranslator translator;
00051     test(translator, "FT-ICR", MS_FT_ICR);
00052     test(translator, " \nFT -  \tICR\t", MS_FT_ICR);
00053     test(translator, " Total \t\n iOn  @#$CurRENT", MS_TIC);
00054 
00055     unit_assert(translator.translate("Darren Kessner") == CVID_Unknown);
00056     translator.insert("DARREN.#$@#$^KESSNER", MS_software);
00057     test(translator, "dARren kESSner", MS_software);
00058 
00059     // test collision detection
00060     bool caught = false;
00061     try
00062     {
00063         translator.insert("darren kessner", MS_m_z); 
00064     }
00065     catch (exception& )
00066     {
00067         caught = true;
00068     }
00069     if (os_) *os_ << "collision caught: " << boolalpha << caught << endl;
00070     unit_assert(caught);
00071 
00072     // test default extra entries
00073 
00074     test(translator, " itms ", MS_ion_trap);
00075     test(translator, " FTmS\n", MS_FT_ICR);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00080 {
00081     try
00082     {
00083         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00084         test();
00085         return 0;
00086     }
00087     catch (exception& e)
00088     {
00089         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00090     }
00091     catch (...)
00092     {
00093         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00094     }
00095     
00096     return 1;
00097 }
